original_title: パンツの穴 THE MOVIE 童貞喪失ラプソディ
overview: Three aimless kids at a seaside high school have just one goal this summer break: to shed the virgin tag. One day, they rescue a pretty girl named Narumi by chance. Immediately smitten, Narumi makes it the summer to remember for the boys.
title: A Hole In My Panty
